text: Basi (Allah) M’mbujegwe ŵampochele kapochele kambone, soni ni ŵankusisye kakusye kambone, ni ŵantesile Zakariya kuŵa nkunchengeta jwakwe. Ndaŵi ni katema kaŵaliji Zakariya ali nkun'jinjilila (Maryamujo) ku chigunguli cha mu nsikitimo, ŵaliji nkuisimana kwa jwalakwejo yakulya. Ŵatiji (pakum'busya): “E Maryam! Kwapi nkuipata ayi?” Jwalakwe jwatiji: “Yalakweyi yikutyochela kwa Allah. Chisimu Allah akumpaga lisiki jwansachile mwangaŵalanjila.”
